fields.title: Beetlejuice
fields.overview: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.
fields.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page

fields.title: The Cotton Club
fields.overview: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.
fields.actors: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee

fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
fields.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

fields.title: Crocodile Dundee
fields.overview: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.
fields.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil

fields.title: Valkyrie
fields.overview: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.
fields.actors: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson

fields.title: Ratatouille
fields.overview: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
fields.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy

fields.title: City of God
fields.overview: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.
fields.actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva

fields.title: Memento
fields.overview: A man juggles searching for his wife's murderer and keeping his short-term memory loss from being an obstacle.
fields.actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior

fields.title: The Intouchables
fields.overview: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
fields.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot

fields.title: Stardust
fields.overview: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.
fields.actors: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly

fields.title: Apocalypto
fields.overview: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.
fields.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead

fields.title: Taxi Driver
fields.overview: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.
fields.actors: Diahnne Abbott, Frank Adu, Victor Argo, Gino Ardito

fields.title: No Country for Old Men
fields.overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
fields.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

fields.title: Planet 51
fields.director: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad, Marcos Martínez
fields.overview: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.
fields.actors: Jessica Biel, John Cleese, Gary Oldman, Dwayne Johnson

fields.title: Looper
fields.overview: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.
fields.actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano

fields.title: Corpse Bride
fields.overview: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Tracey Ullman

fields.title: The Third Man
fields.overview: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
fields.actors: Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Orson Welles, Trevor Howard

fields.title: The Beach
fields.overview: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon, Virginie Ledoyen

fields.title: Scarface
fields.overview: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
fields.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

fields.title: Sid and Nancy
fields.overview: Morbid biographical story of Sid Vicious, bassist with British punk group the Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen. When the Sex Pistols break up after their fateful US tour, ...
fields.actors: Gary Oldman, Chloe Webb, David Hayman, Debby Bishop

fields.title: Black Swan
fields.overview: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.
fields.actors: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Barbara Hershey

fields.title: Inception
fields.overview: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy

fields.title: The Deer Hunter
fields.overview: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.
fields.actors: Robert De Niro, John Cazale, John Savage, Christopher Walken

fields.title: Chasing Amy
fields.overview: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.
fields.actors: Ethan Suplee, Ben Affleck, Scott Mosier, Jason Lee

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
fields.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.
fields.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz

fields.title: American Beauty
fields.overview: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
fields.actors: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley

fields.title: Snatch
fields.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
fields.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Vinnie Jones, Brad Pitt

fields.title: Midnight Express
fields.overview: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.
fields.actors: Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.overview: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
fields.actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta

fields.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
fields.overview: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.
fields.actors: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham

fields.title: Lucky Number Slevin
fields.overview: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.
fields.actors: Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman

fields.title: Rear Window
fields.overview: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
fields.actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter

fields.title: Pan's Labyrinth
fields.overview: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
fields.actors: Ivana Baquero, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú, Doug Jones

fields.title: Shutter Island
fields.overview: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow

fields.title: Reservoir Dogs
fields.overview: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
fields.actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn

fields.title: The Shining
fields.overview: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
fields.actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers

fields.title: Midnight in Paris
fields.overview: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s everyday at midnight.
fields.actors: Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Kurt Fuller, Mimi Kennedy

fields.title: Les Misérables
fields.overview: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.
fields.actors: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried

fields.title: L.A. Confidential
fields.overview: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
fields.actors: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell

fields.title: Moneyball
fields.overview: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.
fields.actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright

fields.title: The Hangover
fields.overview: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.
fields.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha

fields.title: The Great Beauty
fields.overview: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.
fields.actors: Toni Servillo, Carlo Verdone, Sabrina Ferilli, Carlo Buccirosso

fields.title: Gran Torino
fields.overview: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
fields.actors: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang, Ahney Her

fields.title: Mary and Max
fields.overview: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
fields.actors: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Barry Humphries, Eric Bana

fields.title: Flight
fields.overview: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.
fields.actors: Nadine Velazquez, Denzel Washington, Carter Cabassa, Adam C. Edwards

fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
fields.overview: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
fields.actors: Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco, Dean R. Brooks, Alonzo Brown

fields.title: Requiem for a Dream
fields.overview: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
fields.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans

fields.title: The Truman Show
fields.overview: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.
fields.actors: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone

fields.title: The Artist
fields.overview: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.
fields.actors: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.overview: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.
fields.actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys

fields.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
fields.overview: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
fields.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott

fields.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
fields.overview: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.
fields.actors: Rebecca Hall, Scarlett Johansson, Christopher Evan Welch, Chris Messina

fields.title: Slumdog Millionaire
fields.overview: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"
fields.actors: Dev Patel, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor, Rajendranath Zutshi

fields.title: Lost in Translation
fields.overview: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
fields.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Bill Murray, Akiko Takeshita, Kazuyoshi Minamimagoe

fields.title: Match Point
fields.overview: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.
fields.actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Alexander Armstrong, Paul Kaye, Matthew Goode

fields.title: Psycho
fields.overview: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
fields.actors: Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles, John Gavin, Janet Leigh

fields.title: North by Northwest
fields.overview: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.
fields.actors: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis

fields.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
fields.overview: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.
fields.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith

fields.title: Despicable Me 2
fields.overview: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.
fields.actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove

fields.title: Downfall
fields.overview: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.
fields.actors: Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Corinna Harfouch, Ulrich Matthes

fields.title: Madagascar
fields.overview: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs
fields.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith

fields.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
fields.director: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
fields.overview: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.
fields.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith

fields.title: God Bless America
fields.overview: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.
fields.actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Melinda Page Hamilton, Mackenzie Brooke Smith

fields.title: The Social Network
fields.overview: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
fields.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Rooney Mara, Bryan Barter, Dustin Fitzsimons

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.overview: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
fields.actors: Adrien Brody, Emilia Fox, Michal Zebrowski, Ed Stoppard

fields.title: Alive
fields.overview: Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.
fields.actors: Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano, Josh Hamilton, Bruce Ramsay

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.overview: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.
fields.actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains

fields.title: American Gangster
fields.overview: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.
fields.actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin

fields.title: Catch Me If You Can
fields.overview: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen

fields.title: American History X
fields.overview: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
fields.actors: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien

fields.title: Casino
fields.overview: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends, a mafia underboss and a casino owner, for a trophy wife over a gambling empire.
fields.actors: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci, James Woods

fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
fields.overview: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
fields.overview: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Penélope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush, Ian McShane

fields.title: Crash
fields.overview: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.
fields.actors: Karina Arroyave, Dato Bakhtadze, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle

fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
fields.overview: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
fields.actors: Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston

fields.title: Oldboy
fields.overview: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
fields.actors: Min-sik Choi, Ji-tae Yu, Hye-jeong Kang, Dae-han Ji

fields.title: Chocolat
fields.overview: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.
fields.actors: Alfred Molina, Carrie-Anne Moss, Aurelien Parent Koenig, Antonio Gil

fields.title: Casino Royale
fields.overview: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.
fields.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench

fields.title: WALL·E
fields.overview: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
fields.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard

fields.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
fields.overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey

fields.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
fields.overview: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.
fields.actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander

fields.title: Sunset Boulevard
fields.overview: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.
fields.actors: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson

fields.title: I-See-You.Com
fields.overview: A 17-year-old boy buys mini-cameras and displays the footage online at I-see-you.com. The cash rolls in as the site becomes a major hit. Everyone seems to have fun until it all comes crashing down....
fields.actors: Beau Bridges, Rosanna Arquette, Mathew Botuchis, Shiri Appleby

fields.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
fields.overview: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
fields.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody

fields.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
fields.overview: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
fields.actors: Bill Bailey, Anna Chancellor, Warwick Davis, Yasiin Bey

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in America
fields.overview: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
fields.actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Joe Pesci

fields.title: Oblivion
fields.overview: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
fields.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough

fields.title: V for Vendetta
fields.overview: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
fields.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry

fields.title: Gattaca
fields.overview: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
fields.actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Gore Vidal, Xander Berkeley

fields.title: Silver Linings Playbook
fields.overview: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.
fields.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver

fields.title: Alice in Wonderland
fields.overview: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway

fields.title: Gandhi
fields.overview: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.
fields.actors: Ben Kingsley, Candice Bergen, Edward Fox, John Gielgud

fields.title: Pacific Rim
fields.overview: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.
fields.actors: Charlie Hunnam, Diego Klattenhoff, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi

fields.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
fields.overview: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.
fields.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen

fields.title: The Quiet American
fields.overview: An older British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.
fields.actors: Michael Caine, Brendan Fraser, Do Thi Hai Yen, Rade Serbedzija

fields.title: Cloud Atlas
fields.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
fields.overview: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.
fields.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving

fields.title: The Impossible
fields.overview: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
fields.actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Samuel Joslin

fields.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
fields.overview: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.
fields.actors: Louis Wolheim, Lew Ayres, John Wray, Arnold Lucy

fields.title: The English Patient
fields.overview: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.
fields.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe, Kristin Scott Thomas

fields.title: Dallas Buyers Club
fields.overview: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.
fields.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto, Denis O'Hare

fields.title: Frida
fields.overview: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.
fields.actors: Salma Hayek, Mía Maestro, Alfred Molina, Antonio Banderas

fields.title: Before Sunrise
fields.overview: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.
fields.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert, Hanno Pöschl

fields.title: The Rum Diary
fields.overview: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.
fields.actors: Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard

fields.title: The Last Samurai
fields.overview: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.
fields.actors: Ken Watanabe, Tom Cruise, William Atherton, Chad Lindberg

fields.title: Chinatown
fields.overview: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.
fields.actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez

fields.title: Calvary
fields.overview: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.
fields.actors: Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen

fields.title: Before Sunset
fields.overview: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.
fields.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff, Louise Lemoine Torrès

fields.title: Spirited Away
fields.overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
fields.actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô

fields.title: Indochine
fields.overview: This story is set in 1930, at the time when French colonial rule in Indochina is ending. A widowed French woman who works in the rubber fields, raises a Vietnamese princess as if she was ...
fields.actors: Catherine Deneuve, Vincent Perez, Linh Dan Pham, Jean Yanne

fields.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
fields.overview: Illustrated upon the progress of his latest Broadway play, a former popular actor's struggle to cope with his current life as a wasted actor is shown.
fields.actors: Michael Keaton, Emma Stone, Kenny Chin, Jamahl Garrison-Lowe

fields.title: Boyhood
fields.overview: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.
fields.actors: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Elijah Smith, Lorelei Linklater

fields.title: 12 Angry Men
fields.overview: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
fields.actors: Martin Balsam, John Fiedler, Lee J. Cobb, E.G. Marshall

fields.title: The Imitation Game
fields.overview: During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.
fields.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
fields.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow

fields.title: Big Nothing
fields.overview: A frustrated, unemployed teacher joining forces with a scammer and his girlfriend in a blackmailing scheme.
fields.actors: David Schwimmer, Simon Pegg, Alice Eve, Natascha McElhone

fields.title: Das Boot
fields.overview: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.
fields.actors: Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann, Hubertus Bengsch

fields.title: Shrek 2
fields.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
fields.overview: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.
fields.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews

fields.title: Sin City
fields.director: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino
fields.overview: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
fields.actors: Jessica Alba, Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel, Powers Boothe

fields.title: Nebraska
fields.overview: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.
fields.actors: Bruce Dern, Will Forte, June Squibb, Bob Odenkirk

fields.title: Shrek
fields.overview: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, an ogre agrees to rescue a princess for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.
fields.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow

fields.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
fields.overview: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
fields.actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody

fields.title: Original Sin
fields.overview: A woman along with her lover, plan to con a rich man by marrying him and on earning his trust running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she actually begins to fall in love with him.
fields.actors: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane, Jack Thompson

fields.title: Shrek Forever After
fields.overview: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.
fields.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas

fields.title: Before Midnight
fields.overview: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
fields.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Prior

fields.title: Despicable Me
fields.overview: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
fields.actors: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews

fields.title: Troy
fields.overview: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.
fields.actors: Julian Glover, Brian Cox, Nathan Jones, Adoni Maropis

fields.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
fields.overview: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home - and the gold within it - from the dragon Smaug.
fields.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott

fields.title: The Great Gatsby
fields.overview: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.
fields.actors: Lisa Adam, Frank Aldridge, Amitabh Bachchan, Steve Bisley

fields.title: Ice Age
fields.overview: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
fields.actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
fields.actors: Alan Howard, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin, Sala Baker

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.overview: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
fields.actors: Bruce Allpress, Sean Astin, John Bach, Sala Baker

fields.title: Ex Machina
fields.overview: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.
fields.actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Corey Johnson, Oscar Isaac, Alicia Vikander

fields.title: The Theory of Everything
fields.overview: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.
fields.actors: Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior, Sophie Perry

fields.title: Shogun
fields.overview: A English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.
fields.actors: Richard Chamberlain, Toshirô Mifune, Yôko Shimada, Furankî Sakai

fields.title: Spotlight
fields.overview: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
fields.actors: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Liev Schreiber

fields.title: Vertigo
fields.overview: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.
fields.actors: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore

fields.title: Whiplash
fields.overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
fields.actors: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Paul Reiser, Melissa Benoist

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.overview: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.
fields.actors: Martina Gedeck, Ulrich Mühe, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur

fields.title: Hotel Rwanda
fields.overview: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.
fields.actors: Xolani Mali, Don Cheadle, Desmond Dube, Hakeem Kae-Kazim

fields.title: The Martian
fields.overview: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.
fields.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.overview: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.
fields.actors: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy

fields.title: The Hateful Eight
fields.overview: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
fields.actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins

fields.title: A Separation
fields.overview: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.
fields.actors: Peyman Moaadi, Leila Hatami, Sareh Bayat, Shahab Hosseini

fields.title: The Big Short
fields.overview: Four denizens in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.
fields.actors: Ryan Gosling, Rudy Eisenzopf, Casey Groves, Charlie Talbert
